snippet: President Obama and Mitt Romney both governed in periods following economic slumps that weighed down statistics.
abstract: Political Memo; Pres Obama and Mitt Romney face the same conundrum of having governed in periods following economic slowdowns that detrimentally affected their economic records.
lead_paragraph: President Obama and Mitt Romney both governed in periods following economic slumps that weighed down statistics.

headline.main: Trying the Economic Overshoes on Different Feet
headline.print_headline: A President, a Governor and the Economic Numbers Game
